revised_title: On the Expansion of the Point-Potential in Spherical Harmonics
tldr: The author presents a new method for expanding the point-potential in spherical harmonics, allowing for a more comprehensive understanding of the motion of a point-charge outside a fixed spherical conductor. This method is applicable to various scenarios, including uniform and non-uniform motion, and can be used to calculate the forces and radiation at a considerable distance from the origin.
